title: Twin Speex: Time Traitors Book II
description: “…proditoris aevus.” With her dying words Ivy Speex plunges her children into battle. Using the key she has left him, Odell discovers a race of highly evolved beings: proditoris aevus—Time Traitors. He learns that their millennia-long mission to protect humanity from the hostile forces of time has failed. The timeline is fragmenting, and only the siblings Speex can stop it. Odell travels back to the American colonies on the cusp of revolution to alter an important historical event. Meanwhile his twin sister, Ettie, struggles in the present against a constantly shifting reality. And it is left to Odette to seize her destiny and fulfill the prophecy their mother died to protect. Imaginative and rich in historical detail, Twin Speex: Time Traitors Book II delivers another exciting chapter in the Time Traitors saga.
author: Padgett Lively
